# Problem 1
```{r}
#load in library and dataset
library(tidyverse)
library(moderndive)
data("early_january_weather")
```

the variables in this data set include `r origin`, `r year`, `r month`, `r day`,
`r hour`, `r temp`, `r dewp`, `r humid`, `r humid`, `r wind_dir`, `r wind_speed`,
`r wind_gust`, `r precip`, `r pressure`, `r visib`. the size of the data set is:
`r nrow(358)` and `r ncol(15)`. the mean temperature of the data is: 
`r mean(early_january_weather[["temp]]` which is equal to 39.58212.

```{r}
ggplot(early_january_weather, aes(x = time_hour, y  = temp, color = "humid")) + geom_point()
```
